attributes.action: Increase the minimum wage of 16 to 17 year olds who are in Full-time education and working on the side (or Part-time work).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want the prime minister to increase the current minimum wage for 16-17 (or under 18's in general) who are in full-time education and working part-time

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
